info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 6:40PM PDT until August 01 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM PDT FOR CENTRAL CLARK COUNTY... At 639 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Summerlin, and is nearly stationary. Strong wind gusts of 50 mph have been observed across parts of the western Las Vegas Valley and remain possible ahead of the thunderstorm. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs and trees. Locations impacted include... Las Vegas, North Las Vegas, Lone Mountain, Summerlin, The Strip, Spring Valley, Centennial Hills, Paradise, Enterprise, Red Rock Canyon Campground, North Las Vegas Airport, Mccarran International Airport, Stratosphere Tower and The Lakes. This includes State Route 159 in Red Rock Canyon between mile markers 13 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
